name: exlimiieq2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- w0
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))

|- w0
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)

comment: Inferring a theorem when it is implied by an equality which may be true. (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.) (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2018.)
